decision_conditions:
<p class="paragraph" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:18.75pt;margin-bottom:
0cm;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;vertical-align:baseline"><span class="normaltextrun"><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">All
new windows located on a wall or slope forming a side elevation shall be
finished in obscure-glaze. Windows less than 1.7 metres above floor level shall
be non-openable. &nbsp;<br></span></span></p><p class="paragraph" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:18.75pt;margin-bottom:
0cm;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;vertical-align:baseline"><span class="normaltextrun"><span class="normaltextrun"><span style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-ansi-language:
EN-GB;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><br></span></span></p><p class="paragraph" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:18.75pt;margin-bottom:
0cm;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;vertical-align:baseline"><span class="normaltextrun"><span style="font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
description: Construction of a single storey rear outbuilding
